name: Kookie Karter
description:
Race against the clock in this fast pace arcade obstacle-hell racer as a Cookie person set on taking back as many stolen candy as you can possibly get from the hands of the evil vegetable army. Traverse through 4 different locations with difficulty ranging from easy to pure insanity.

This game is compatible with an Xbox controller:

  • D pads for movement,
  • A button for jump/confirm,
  • Start button for menu.

Game Jam notice:

This game is made for the Cookie Jam 2021 and is released as a free non-commercial game.

  • Game developed by: Al Tan
  • Music composed by: Kanoa Ichiyanagi (Portfolio & Soundcloud) 
  • Sprite & BG Art by: Potato Dude
